title: S13 Ep77: Beyond Time & Space, Beyond Life and Death is Moving in the Light
itunes:title: Beyond Time & Space, Beyond Life and Death is Moving in the Light
description:
Today BEYOND the DARKNESS goes Beyond Time & Space, Beyond Life and Death is Moving in the Light with guest Von Braschler.

When his friend is diagnosed with incurable cancer Von Braschler is flooded with a memory from his past, a strange call he recieved....from the dead.

Armed with this knowledge he walks hand in hand with his friend into the fringes of consciousness and together they find the boundaries of what we call life and death, preparing both for a journey to the other side.

Get his book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
